QuestData.Title: Where Dragons Rule
QuestData.Description:
Thanks to your help, Thrymjaris was able to escape the clutches of that vile demon. She bid me wait for you, so that I could take you to her once you had finished dispatching your foes.
She has gathered our brood at the top of Thorim's Peak to prepare for a counterattack.
Would you join us?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Vethir to fly to the top of Thorim's Peak.
QuestData.RewardText: You are truly a hero to my brood. $B$BYou have gained a powerful ally today, outsider. The God-King has reason to fear you.

Objectives.Objective: Fly to the top of Thorim's Peak
